data.actual_result: They do not change colors. The colour remains the same which makes them barely visible.
data.expected_result: They change their colours with the change in theme.
data.short_description: The design in the background of  full screen view of a voice call and the design in the background of the invite screen is almost completely invisible on light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to light theme. - Go to a DM and start a call. - Observe the background.
